Insert into ConsultantMaster
(Id, Name, Primary_Contact_No, Secondary_contact_No, Address, Email_Id) values
(:Id, :Name, :Primary_Contact_No, :Secondary_contact_No, :Address, :Email_Id)

Update ConsultantMaster set
Name=:Name, Primary_Contact_No=:Primary_Contact_No, Secondary_contact_No=:Secondary_contact_No, Address=:Address, Email_Id=:Email_Id
where Id=:Id

Insert into ConsultantDetail
(File_No, Consultant_Id, Consultancy_Agreed, Payment_Mode, Amount_To_Pay, Due_Date) values
(:File_No, :Consultant_Id, :Consultancy_Agreed, :Payment_Mode, :Amount_To_Pay, :Due_Date)
Delete from ConsultantDetail where File_No=:File_No and Consultant_Id=:Consultant_Id;
